"%.2f" ((GetPluginVersion "yUI")/100)) else SetUIStringAlt "HUDMainMenu\_yUIVER" "Not Installed" endif SetOnMenuClickEventHandler MAPMOMenuClickSCRIPT 1 "StartMenu\NOGLOW_BRANCH" SetOnMenuClickEventHandler MAPMOMenuClickSCRIPT 1 "StartMenu\MAPMO" SetOnMenuClickEventHandler MAPMOMenuClickSCRIPT 1 "StartMenu\MCM" iCount = 266 while (iCount -= 1) > 0 SetOnKeyDownEventHandler ({int iKeyID} => Call MAPMOInputSCRIPT iKeyID 0) 1 iCount loop SetEventHandler "OnButtonDown:63487" ({int iButtonID} => Call MAPMOInputSCRIPT iButtonID 1) SetEventHandler "OnActorEquip" ({ref Equipper ref Equipped} => CallAfterFrames 1 ({} => MAPMOMainQUEST.HUDColor = -1) 1) "first"::Player SetEventHandler "OnActorUnEquip" ({ref Unequipper ref Unequipped} => CallAfterFrames 1 ({} => MAPMOMainQUEST.HUDColor = -1) 1) "first"::Player SetEventHandler "ShowOff:OnQuestAdded" (Begin Function {ref QuestREF} if eval QuestLogAddNewQuest && (ar_find QuestREF QuestLogList) < 0 && (ar_size QuestLogList) < 5 ar_append QuestLogList QuestREF endif End) SetOnActorValueChangeEventHandler 1 MAPMOAVChangeSCRIPT 0 SetGameMainLoopCallBack MAPMOCallBackGameModeSCRIPT 1 1 1 SetGameMainLoopCallBack MAPMOCallBackMenuModeSCRIPT 1 1 2 SetGameMainLoopCallBack MAPMOCallBackAnyModeSCRIPT 1 1 3 SetGameMainLoopCallBack MAPMOUITweaksCallbackSCRIPT 1 1 3 CallFunctionNextFrame ({} => SetCursorPos scn MAPMOCallbackAnyModeSCRIPT
int iCount int QuestLogSize int UIRed int UIGreen int UIBlue int ColorChange int MainOrPause int HUDColor int PauseColor int PipBoyColor
ref QuestREF
Begin Function {} if eval !(MAPMOMainQUEST.INIChecked) || GetGameLoaded MAPMOMainQUEST.AnhOn = IsPluginInstalled "AnhNVSE" MAPMOMainQUEST.B42NotifyOn = IsComponentLoaded "HUDMainMenu\B42N" SetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\_MAPMOB42Notify" MAPMOMainQUEST.B42NotifyOn MAPMOMainQUEST.DarnOn = IsModLoaded "DarNifiedUINV.esp" MAPMOMainQUEST.HUDEditorOn = IsModLoaded "TheHUDEditor.esm" MAPMOMainQUEST.VUIOn = GetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\_VUI+" > -1 MAPMOMainQUEST.UITweaksBit = 65535-(53183*(FileExists "textures\interface\revelation" 1))-(64*(sv_find "revelation" (GetUIString "HUDMainMenu\JLM\JLMBackdrop\filename") > -1)) MAPMOMainQUEST.RevelationOn = FileExists "textures\interface\revelation" 1 MAPMOMainQUEST.JIPMMOn = IsModLoaded "JIP MiniMap.esp" MAPMOMainQUEST.MCMOn = IsModLoaded "The Mod Configuration Menu.esp" SetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\_MAPMOMCM" MAPMOMainQUEST.MCMOn MAPMOMainQUEST.TTWOn = IsModLoaded "TaleOfTwoWastelands.esm" SetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\_MAPMOTTW" MAPMOMainQUEST.TTWOn MAPMOMainQUEST.TTWGlobal = EditorIDToFormID "bInDCWasteland" MAPMOMainQUEST.HUDColor = -1 MAPMOMainQUEST.QuestLogInit = 0 Call MAPMOINISCRIPT 0 "Main And Pause Menus Overhaul.ini" 0 "data\config\Main And Pause Menus Overhaul.ini" 0 if GetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\QuestLog\visible" > -1 UnloadUIComponent "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\QuestLog" endif QuestLogSize = ar_size MAPMOMainQUEST.QuestLogList if QuestLogSize == -1 MAPMOMainQUEST.QuestLogList = ar_construct "array" MAPMOMainQUEST.QuestLogToggle = 1 endif while (QuestLogSize -= 1) > -1 QuestREF = MAPMOMainQUEST.QuestLogList[QuestLogSize] if IsFormValid QuestREF if GetType QuestREF == 71 if eval GetQuestCompleted QuestREF || !(GetQuestRunning QuestREF) ar_erase MAPMOMainQUEST.QuestLogList (ar_find QuestREF MAPMOMainQUEST.QuestLogList) endif else ar_erase MAPMOMainQUEST.QuestLogList (ar_find QuestREF MAPMOMainQUEST.QuestLogList) endif else ar_erase MAPMOMainQUEST.QuestLogList (ar_find QuestREF MAPMOMainQUEST.QuestLogList) endif loop MAPMOMainQUEST.QuestLogInit = 1 MAPMOMainQUEST.HUDOpacity = ((GetNumericINISetting "fHudOpacity:Interface")*255) Call MAPMOAVChangeSCRIPT -1 0 0 SetUIStringAlt "HUDMainMenu\_MAPMODeathCounterTotal" (sv_construct "%.0f" (GetINIFloat ("CHARACTERS:"+$Player) "Main And Pause Menus Overhaul\Death Counter.ini")) SetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\AchievementPopUp\_showhide" 0 SetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\AchievementPopUp\_busy" 0 SetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\AchievementPopUp\Icon\alpha" 0 SetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\AchievementPopUp\Unlocked\alpha" 0 SetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\AchievementPopUp\SeparatorLeft\width" 0 SetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\AchievementPopUp\Title\alpha" 0 SetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\AchievementPopUp\Description\alpha" 0 SetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\MAPMO\_init" 0 CallWhilePerSeconds 0.1 MAPMOQuestLogSCRIPT ({} => MAPMOMainQUEST.TotalCaps != -21) CallWhilePerSeconds 0.005 MAPMOHUDCapsSCRIPT ({} => MAPMOMainQUEST.TotalCaps != -21) endif ;UI COLORS ;0 = HUD - Mojave ;1 = HUD - Capital ;2 = Pause - Mojave ;3 = Pause - Capital ;4 = Power Armor ;5 = Pip-Boy 3000 ;6 = Pimp-Boy if MAPMOMainQUEST.HUDColor < 0 MAPMOMainQUEST.PauseColor = -1 MAPMOMainQUEST.PipBoyColor = -1 MAPMOMainQUEST.PlayerWearsPA = IsPA (GetEquippedObject 2) MAPMOMainQUEST.PlayerWearsPimp = GetEquipped PimpBoy endif ;HUD COLOR if eval MAPMOMainQUEST.EnablePowerArmorColor && MAPMOMainQUEST.PlayerWearsPA HUDColor = 4 elseif MAPMOMainQUEST.TTWOn if GetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\NOGLOW_BRANCH\main_title\visible" == 1 HUDColor += MAPMOMainQUEST.MainMenuColorDefault else HUDColor += GetGlobalVariable (MAPMOMainQUEST.TTWGlobal) endif endif ;PAUSE COLOR PauseColor = 2 if MAPMOMainQUEST.PauseMatchHUD PauseColor = HUDColor elseif MAPMOMainQUEST.TTWOn if GetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\NOGLOW_BRANCH\main_title\visible" == 1 PauseColor += MAPMOMainQUEST.MainMenuColorDefault else PauseColor += GetGlobalVariable (MAPMOMainQUEST.TTWGlobal) endif endif if GetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\NOGLOW_BRANCH\main_title\visible" > -1 HUDColor = PauseColor endif ;PIP-BOY COLOR PipBoyColor = 5 if MAPMOMainQUEST.PipBoyMatchHUD PipBoyColor = HUDColor elseif eval MAPMOMainQUEST.EnablePowerArmorColor && MAPMOMainQUEST.PlayerWearsPA && MAPMOMainQUEST.PowerArmorColorPipBoy PipBoyColor = 4 elseif MAPMOMainQUEST.PlayerWearsPimp PipBoyColor = 6 endif if MAPMOMainQUEST.HUDColor != HUDColor if HUDColor == 0 SetSystemColor 1 MAPMOMainQUEST.HUDSliderRed MAPMOMainQUEST.HUDSliderGreen MAPMOMainQUEST.HUDSliderBlue elseif HUDColor == 1 SetSystemColor 1 MAPMOMainQUEST.HUDDCSliderRed MAPMOMainQUEST.HUDDCSliderGreen MAPMOMainQUEST.HUDDCSliderBlue elseif HUDColor == 2 SetSystemColor 1 MAPMOMainQUEST.PauseSliderRed MAPMOMainQUEST.PauseSliderGreen MAPMOMainQUEST.PauseSliderBlue elseif HUDColor == 3 SetSystemColor 1 MAPMOMainQUEST.PauseDCSliderRed MAPMOMainQUEST.PauseDCSliderGreen MAPMOMainQUEST.PauseDCSliderBlue elseif HUDColor == 4 SetSystemColor 1 MAPMOMainQUEST.PowerArmorSliderRed MAPMOMainQUEST.PowerArmorSliderGreen MAPMOMainQUEST.PowerArmorSliderBlue elseif HUDColor == 5 SetSystemColor 1 MAPMOMainQUEST.PipBoySliderRed MAPMOMainQUEST.PipBoySliderGreen MAPMOMainQUEST.PipBoySliderBlue elseif HUDColor == 6 SetSystemColor 1 MAPMOMainQUEST.PimpBoySliderRed MAPMOMainQUEST.PimpBoySliderGreen MAPMOMainQUEST.PimpBoySliderBlue endif MAPMOMainQUEST.HUDColor = HUDColor endif if MAPMOMainQUEST.PauseColor != PauseColor if PauseColor == 0 SetSystemColor 5 MAPMOMainQUEST.HUDSliderRed MAPMOMainQUEST.HUDSliderGreen MAPMOMainQUEST.HUDSliderBlue elseif PauseColor == 1 SetSystemColor 5 MAPMOMainQUEST.HUDDCSliderRed MAPMOMainQUEST.HUDDCSliderGreen MAPMOMainQUEST.HUDDCSliderBlue elseif PauseColor == 2 SetSystemColor 5 MAPMOMainQUEST.PauseSliderRed MAPMOMainQUEST.PauseSliderGreen MAPMOMainQUEST.PauseSliderBlue elseif PauseColor == 3 SetSystemColor 5 MAPMOMainQUEST.PauseDCSliderRed MAPMOMainQUEST.PauseDCSliderGreen MAPMOMainQUEST.PauseDCSliderBlue elseif PauseColor == 4 SetSystemColor 5 MAPMOMainQUEST.PowerArmorSliderRed MAPMOMainQUEST.PowerArmorSliderGreen MAPMOMainQUEST.PowerArmorSliderBlue elseif PauseColor == 5 SetSystemColor 5 MAPMOMainQUEST.PipBoySliderRed MAPMOMainQUEST.PipBoySliderGreen MAPMOMainQUEST.PipBoySliderBlue elseif PauseColor == 6 SetSystemColor 5 MAPMOMainQUEST.PimpBoySliderRed MAPMOMainQUEST.PimpBoySliderGreen MAPMOMainQUEST.PimpBoySliderBlue endif MAPMOMainQUEST.PauseColor = PauseColor endif if MAPMOMainQUEST.PipBoyColor != PipBoyColor if PipBoyColor == 0 SetSystemColor 4 MAPMOMainQUEST.HUDSliderRed MAPMOMainQUEST.HUDSliderGreen MAPMOMainQUEST.HUDSliderBlue elseif PipBoyColor == 1 SetSystemColor 4 MAPMOMainQUEST.HUDDCSliderRed MAPMOMainQUEST.HUDDCSliderGreen MAPMOMainQUEST.HUDDCSliderBlue elseif PipBoyColor == 2 SetSystemColor 4 MAPMOMainQUEST.PauseSliderRed MAPMOMainQUEST.PauseSliderGreen MAPMOMainQUEST.PauseSliderBlue elseif PipBoyColor == 3 SetSystemColor 4 MAPMOMainQUEST.PauseDCSliderRed MAPMOMainQUEST.PauseDCSliderGreen MAPMOMainQUEST.PauseDCSliderBlue elseif PipBoyColor == 4 SetSystemColor 4 MAPMOMainQUEST.PowerArmorSliderRed MAPMOMainQUEST.PowerArmorSliderGreen MAPMOMainQUEST.PowerArmorSliderBlue elseif PipBoyColor == 5 SetSystemColor 4 MAPMOMainQUEST.PipBoySliderRed MAPMOMainQUEST.PipBoySliderGreen MAPMOMainQUEST.PipBoySliderBlue elseif PipBoyColor == 6 SetSystemColor 4 MAPMOMainQUEST.PimpBoySliderRed MAPMOMainQUEST.PimpBoySliderGreen MAPMOMainQUEST.PimpBoySliderBlue endif MAPMOMainQUEST.PipBoyColor = PipBoyColor endif ;HUD QUEST LOG if flr MAPMOMainQUEST.HUDOpacity != flr (GetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\alpha") if GetUIFloat "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\QuestLog\visible" > -1 UnloadUIComponent "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\QuestLog" endif MAPMOMainQUEST.HUDOpacity = ((GetNumericINISetting "fHudOpacity:Interface")*255) endif ;HARDCORE NEEDS SetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\_MAPMOHardcore" (IsHardcore) if GetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\_MAPMOShowHardcoreNeeds" == 1 if GetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\HardcoreMode\Dehydration\visible" == 1 SetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\HardcoreMode\Dehydration\visible" 0 SetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\HardcoreMode\Hunger\visible" 0 SetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\HardcoreMode\Sleep\visible" 0 SetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\HardcoreMode\Rads\visible" 0 SetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\HardcoreMode\LMBs\visible" 0 endif if GetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\DUIHCMode\visible" == 1 SetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\DUIHCMode\visible" 0 endif else if GetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\HardcoreMode\Dehydration\visible" == 0 SetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\HardcoreMode\Dehydration\visible" 1 SetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\HardcoreMode\Hunger\visible" 1 SetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\HardcoreMode\Sleep\visible" 1 SetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\HardcoreMode\Rads\visible" 1 SetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\HardcoreMode\LMBs\visible" 1 endif if GetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\DUIHCMode\visible" == 0 SetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\DUIHCMode\visible" 1 endif endif ;RADS METER if MAPMOMainQUEST.ShowHUDRadsCounter if GetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\RadsCounter\_enabled" == 0 SetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\RadsCounter\_enabled" (GetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\RadiationMeter\x") SetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\RadiationMeter\x" -500 endif elseif GetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\RadsCounter\_enabled" > 0 SetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\RadiationMeter\x" (GetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\RadsCounter\_enabled") SetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\RadsCounter\_enabled" 0 endif End
ALL THESE OPTIONS ARE CONFIGRABLE DIRECTLY IN GAME VIA THE CONFIGURATION MENU, ACCESSIBLE BY PRESSING THE N KEY BY DEFAULT.
TTW Only, HUD Color settings for the Capital Wasteland. Presets: 0=CUSTOM, 1=AMBER, 2=White, 3=GREEN, 4=BLUE, 5=CLASSIC, 6=YELLOW.
TTW - Decides which preset to use in the main menu.
TTW Only, Pause Color settings for the Capital Wasteland. Presets: 0=CUSTOM, 1=AMBER, 2=White, 3=GREEN, 4=BLUE, 5=CLASSIC, 6=YELLOW.
Changes the HUD color when wearing a power armor.
Add the FNV logo in the Pause menu.
Change the Pause background's texture. 0 = None, 1 = VANILLA FNV, 2 = VANILLA F3, 3 = MAPMO FNV, 4 = MAPMO F3.
TTW Only, automatically change texture depending on which wasteland you're in. 1 = VANILLA, 2 = MAPMO.
Apply the Pause background's settings to the Pop-Up background.
Show the real time in the pause menu. 1 = 24 hours format, 2 = 12 hours format.
Show the active quest in the pause menu.
Color of the objectives text. 0= White, 1= Match HUD color.
Show the active quest in HUD.
Automatically adds new quests to the quest log.
Color of the objectives text. 0 = White, 1 = Match HUD color.
Alignement of the quest log text. 1 = Left, 4 = Right.
Show an XP gauge in the Pause menu.
Show your Caps amount in the Pause menu.
Show your inventory and carry weight in the Pause menu.
Show your current location in the Pause menu.
X axis position of the Location.
Y axis position of the Location.
Change the font of the buttons in the Main and Pause menus.
Change the font of the NPC's name in the Dialog Menu.
Change the font of the Level Up Menu's title.
Change the font of the Trait Menu's title.
Key to open this mod's configuration menu.
Key to open the MCM menu.
Key to open the Quest Log.
Key to open the Achievements Log.
Key to open B42 - Notify's log.
Makes JIP MiniMap's frame match the HUD color.
Makes JIP MiniMap's icons match the HUD or Pip-Boy color. 0 = No Color, 1 = HUD, 4 = PIP-BOY
Makes JIP MiniMap's map match the HUD or Pip-Boy color. 0 = No Color, 1 = HUD, 4 = PIP-BOY
Show a list of NVSE plugins and their versions in the Main menu.
Plugin Checker Icon. 0 = Ranger Helmet, 2 = T-45d Helmet, 4 = Vault Boy.
Width of The HUD Editor's menu.
X Axis position of The HUD Editor's menu.
Adds an animated caps counter on the HUD, inspired by Fallout 76.
Plays a sound when the animation start.
Makes the counter always visible on the HUD.
X Use colorized icon. 0 = Enabled, 1 = Disabled.
Adds a rotating animation to the icon.
Sets the speed of the animation.
X HUD Caps font. 21 = Brush, 22 = Futura.
Shows Hardcore needs on the HUD.
Makes the needs always visible on the HUD, otherwise they are hidden when full like Vanilla.
Alignement of the UI elements. 0 = Vertical-Left, 1 = Vertical-Right, 2 = Horizontal-Left, 3 = Horizontal-Right.
Shows a death counter on the Pause menu.
Replaces the fuzzy background of all menus.
Makes the background match the UI color.
Blur the edges of the menu backgrounds.
Adds boxes to the main and settings menus.
Adds background to the dialogue menu subtitles.
Adds a pop-up for unlocking achievements.
Show the game's time on the HUD.

INIFile += "%riActiveQuestHotkey="+$ActiveQuestHotkey+" "+$SemiColon+"Key to switch active quest." INIFile += "%riAchievementsLogHotkey="+$AchievementsLogHotkey+" "+$SemiColon+"Key to open the Achievements Log." INIFile += "%riB42NotifyHotkey="+$B42NotifyHotkey+" "+$SemiColon+"Key to open B42 - Notify's log."
INIFile += "%r%r"+$SemiColon+"JIP MINIMAP" INIFile += "%rbJIPMMFrameMatchHUDColor="+$JIPMMFrameMatchHUDColor+" "+$SemiColon+"Makes JIP MiniMap's frame match the HUD color." INIFile += "%riJIPMMIconsMatchUIColor="+$JIPMMIconsMatchUIColor+" "+$SemiColon+"Makes JIP MiniMap's icons match the HUD or Pip-Boy color. 0 = No Color, 1 = HUD, 4 = PIP-BOY" INIFile += "%riJIPMMMapMatchUIColor="+$JIPMMMapMatchUIColor+" "+$SemiColon+"Makes JIP MiniMap's map match the HUD or Pip-Boy color. 0 = No Color, 1 = HUD, 4 = PIP-BOY"
INIFile += "%r%r"+$SemiColon+"PLUGIN CHECKER" INIFile += "%rbShowPluginChecker="+$ShowPluginChecker+" "+$SemiColon+"Show a list of NVSE plugins and their versions in the Main menu." INIFile += "%riPluginCheckerIcon="+$PluginCheckerIcon+" "+$SemiColon+"Plugin Checker Icon. 0 = Ranger Helmet, 2 = T-45d Helmet, 4 = Vault Boy."
INIFile += "%r%r"+$SemiColon+"THE HUD EDITOR" INIFile += "%riHUDEditorMenuWidth="+$HUDEditorMenuWidth+" "+$SemiColon+"Width of The HUD Editor's menu." INIFile += "%riHUDEditorMenuXPos="+$HUDEditorMenuXPos+" "+$SemiColon+"X Axis position of The HUD Editor's menu."
INIFile += "%r%r"+$SemiColon+"HUD CAPS" INIFile += "%rbShowHUDCaps="+$ShowHUDCaps+" "+$SemiColon+"Adds an animated caps counter on the HUD, inspired by Fallout 76." INIFile += "%rbHUDCapsPlaySound="+$HUDCapsPlaySound+" "+$SemiColon+"Plays a sound when the animation start." INIFile += "%rbHUDCapsAlwaysVisible="+$HUDCapsAlwaysVisible+" "+$SemiColon+"Makes the counter always visible on the HUD." INIFile += "%rbHUDCapsColorizedIcon="+$HUDCapsColorizedIcon+" "+$SemiColon+"X Use colorized icon. 0 = Enabled, 1 = Disabled." INIFile += "%rbHUDCapsRotateIcon="+$HUDCapsRotateIcon+" "+$SemiColon+"Adds a rotating animation to the icon." INIFile += "%rfHUDCapsRotateSpeed="+$HUDCapsRotateSpeed+" "+$SemiColon+"Sets the speed of the animation." INIFile += "%riHUDCapsFont="+$HUDCapsFont+" "+$SemiColon+"X HUD Caps font. 21 = Brush, 22 = Futura." INIFile += "%riHUDCapsXPos="+$HUDCapsXPos+" "+$SemiColon+"X Axis position." INIFile += "%riHUDCapsYPos="+$HUDCapsYPos+" "+$SemiColon+"Y Axis position." INIFile += "%riHUDCapsScale="+$HUDCapsScale+" "+$SemiColon+"Scale. Max: 200%%."
INIFile += "%r%r"+$SemiColon+"HARDCORE NEEDS" INIFile += "%rbShowHardcoreNeeds="+$ShowHardcoreNeeds+" "+$SemiColon+"Shows Hardcore needs on the HUD." INIFile += "%rbHardcoreNeedsAlwaysVisible="+$HardcoreNeedsAlwaysVisible+" "+$SemiColon+"Makes the needs always visible on the HUD, otherwise they are hidden when full like Vanilla." INIFile += "%riHardcoreNeedsGauge="+$HardcoreNeedsGauge+" "+$SemiColon+"Adds a gauge." INIFile += "%riHardcoreNeedsAlign="+$HardcoreNeedsAlign+" "+$SemiColon+"Alignement of the UI elements. 0 = Vertical-Left, 1 = Vertical-Right, 2 = Horizontal-Left, 3 = Horizontal-Right." INIFile += "%riHardcoreNeedsXPos="+$HardcoreNeedsXPos+" "+$SemiColon+"X Axis position." INIFile += "%riHardcoreNeedsYPos="+$HardcoreNeedsYPos+" "+$SemiColon+"Y Axis position." INIFile += "%riHardcoreNeedsScale="+$HardcoreNeedsScale+" "+$SemiColon+"Scale. Max: 200%%."
INIFile += "%r%r"+$SemiColon+"DEATH COUNTER" INIFile += "%rbShowDeathCounter="+$ShowDeathCounter+" "+$SemiColon+"Shows a death counter on the Pause menu." INIFile += "%riDeathCounterXPos="+$DeathCounterXPos+" "+$SemiColon+"X Axis position." INIFile += "%riDeathCounterYPos="+$DeathCounterYPos+" "+$SemiColon+"Y Axis position." INIFile += "%riDeathCounterScale="+$DeathCounterScale+" "+$SemiColon+"Scale. Max: 200%%."
INIFile += "%r%r"+$SemiColon+"UI TWEAKS" INIFile += "%rbShowUITweaks="+$ShowUITweaks+" "+$SemiColon+"Replaces the fuzzy background of all menus." INIFile += "%rbCleanMenuBackgroundsColorized="+$CleanMenuBackgroundsColorized+" "+$SemiColon+"Makes the background match the UI color." INIFile += "%rbUITweaksFadedEdges="+$UITweaksFadedEdges+" "+$SemiColon+"Blur the edges of the menu backgrounds." INIFile += "%rbShowMainPauseMenuBox="+$ShowMainPauseMenuBox+" "+$SemiColon+"Adds boxes to the main and settings menus." INIFile += "%rbShowSubtitlesBackground="+$ShowSubtitlesBackground+" "+$SemiColon+"Adds background to the dialogue menu subtitles."
INIFile += "%r%r"+$SemiColon+"HUD ACHIEVEMENT POP-UP" INIFile += "%rbShowHUDAchievementsPopUp="+$ShowHUDAchievementsPopUp+" "+$SemiColon+"Adds a pop-up for unlocking achievements." INIFile += "%riHUDAchievementsPopUpXPos="+$HUDAchievementsPopUpXPos+" "+$SemiColon+"X axis position." INIFile += "%riHUDAchievementsPopUpYPos="+$HUDAchievementsPopUpYPos+" "+$SemiColon+"Y axis position." INIFile += "%riHUDAchievementsPopUpScale="+$HUDAchievementsPopUpScale+" "+$SemiColon+"Scale. Max: 200%%."
INIFile += "%r%r"+$SemiColon+"HUD TIME" INIFile += "%riShowHUDTime="+$ShowHUDTime+" "+$SemiColon+"Show the game's time on the HUD." INIFile += "%rbHUDTimeDate="+$HUDTimeDate+" "+$SemiColon+"Show the date." INIFile += "%riHUDTimeOpacity="+$HUDTimeOpacity+" "+$SemiColon+"Opacity." INIFile += "%riHUDTimeXPos="+$HUDTimeXPos+" "+$SemiColon+"X axis position." INIFile += "%riHUDTimeYPos="+$HUDTimeYPos+" "+$SemiColon+"Y axis position." INIFile += "%riHUDTimeScale="+$HUDTimeScale+" "+$SemiColon+"Scale. Max: 200%%."
INIFile += "%r%r"+$SemiColon+"HUD RADS COUNTER" INIFile += "%rbShowHUDRadsCounter="+$ShowHUDRadsCounter+" "+$SemiColon+"Replaces the vanilla Rads meter." INIFile += "%riHUDRadsCounterXPos="+$HUDRadsCounterXPos+" "+$SemiColon+"X axis position." INIFile += "%riHUDRadsCounterYPos="+$HUDRadsCounterYPos+" "+$SemiColon+"Y axis position." INIFile += "%riHUDRadsCounterScale="+$HUDRadsCounterScale+" "+$SemiColon+"Scale. Max: 200%%."
WriteStringToFile $WriteININame 0 ($INIFile) endif MAPMOMainQUEST.INIChecked = 1 if ConfigMenu Call MAPMOConfig01SCRIPT endif End

scn MAPMOInputSCRIPT

Begin Function {int InputID int IsController} if MenuMode 3 Return endif int ConDUp = 1 int ConDDown = 2 int ConDLeft = 4 int ConDRight = 8 int ConStart = 16 int ConBack = 32 int ConLTS = 64 int OpenMAPMOMenu = GetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\NOGLOW_BRANCH\main_container\_enabled" == 1 endif if InputID == ConLB OpenMCM = !(MenuMode 4) && GetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\NOGLOW_BRANCH\main_container\_enabled" == 1 && GetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\MCM\MCM_Options\visible" != 1 && MAPMOMainQUEST.MCMOn endif if InputID == ConA PipTrackQuest = GetUIFloatAlt "MapMenu\GLOW_BRANCH\MM_MainRect\MM_QuestsList\_enabled" == 1 && MAPMOMainQUEST.QuestLogEnabled endif if InputID == ConB CloseMAPMOMenu = MAPMOMainQUEST.MAPMOCurrentMenu > 0 CloseMCM = GetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\MCM\MCM_Options\visible" == 1 CloseAchievementsLog = GetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\MAPMO\AchievementsLog\_open" > 0 CloseB42Notify = GetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\B42NP\visible" > -1 CloseQuestLog = MAPMOMainQUEST.MAPMOQuestLogMenu > 0 endif if InputID == ConX OpenAchievementsLog = !(MenuMode 4) && GetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\NOGLOW_BRANCH\main_container\_enabled" == 1 && GetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\MAPMO\AchievementsLog\_open" == 0 SwitchAchievementsLog = GetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\MAPMO\AchievementsLog\_open" > 0 && GetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\MAPMO\AchievementsLog\_logs" > 1 endif if InputID == ConY OpenB42Notify = GetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\NOGLOW_BRANCH\main_container\_enabled" == 1 && GetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\B42NP\visible" < 0 && MAPMOMainQUEST.B42NotifyOn PipTrackQuest = 3*(GetUIFloatAlt "MapMenu\GLOW_BRANCH\MM_MainRect\MM_QuestsList\_enabled" == 1 && MAPMOMainQUEST.QuestLogEnabled) endif else if InputID == MAPMOMainQUEST.MAPMOHotkey OpenMAPMOMenu = GetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\NOGLOW_BRANCH\main_container\_enabled" == 1 endif if InputID == MAPMOMainQUEST.MCMHotkey OpenMCM = !(MenuMode 4) && GetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\NOGLOW_BRANCH\main_container\_enabled" == 1 && GetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\MCM\MCM_Options\visible" != 1 && MAPMOMainQUEST.MCMOn endif if InputID == MAPMOMainQUEST.QuestLogHotkey if eval IsKeyPressed 42 || IsKeyPressed 54 OpenQuestLog = !(MenuMode) && MAPMOMainQUEST.QuestLogEnabled else ToggleQuestLog = !(MenuMode) && MAPMOMainQUEST.QuestLogEnabled endif endif if InputID == MAPMOMainQUEST.ActiveQuestHotkey if eval IsKeyPressed 42 || IsKeyPressed 54 ClearQuest = !(MenuMode) && MAPMOMainQUEST.QuestLogEnabled else SwitchQuest = !(MenuMode) && MAPMOMainQUEST.QuestLogEnabled endif endif if InputID == MAPMOMainQUEST.AchievementsLogHotkey OpenAchievementsLog = !(MenuMode 4) && GetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\NOGLOW_BRANCH\main_container\_enabled" == 1 && GetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\MAPMO\AchievementsLog\_open" == 0 SwitchAchievementsLog = GetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\MAPMO\AchievementsLog\_open" > 0 && GetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\MAPMO\AchievementsLog\_logs" > 1 endif if InputID == MAPMOMainQUEST.B42NotifyHotkey OpenB42Notify = GetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\NOGLOW_BRANCH\main_container\_enabled" == 1 && GetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\B42NP\visible" < 0 && MAPMOMainQUEST.B42NotifyOn endif if InputID == KeyE CloseMAPMOMenu = MAPMOMainQUEST.MAPMOCurrentMenu > 0 CloseMCM = GetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\MCM\MCM_Options\visible" == 1 CloseAchievementsLog = GetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\MAPMO\AchievementsLog\_open" > 0 CloseB42Notify = GetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\B42NP\visible" > -1 CloseQuestLog = MAPMOMainQUEST.MAPMOQuestLogMenu > 0 endif if InputID == KeyLMB PipTrackQuest = GetUIFloatAlt "MapMenu\GLOW_BRANCH\MM_MainRect\MM_QuestsList\_enabled" == 1 && MAPMOMainQUEST.QuestLogEnabled endif if InputID == KeyRMB PipTrackQuest = 3*(GetUIFloatAlt "MapMenu\GLOW_BRANCH\MM_MainRect\MM_QuestsList\_enabled" == 1 && MAPMOMainQUEST.QuestLogEnabled) endif endif if OpenMAPMOMenu MAPMOMainQUEST.MAPMOCurrentMenu = 1 Call MAPMOConfig01SCRIPT elseif CloseMAPMOMenu PlaySound UIMenuCancel 1 ClickMenuButton "MessageMenu\NOGLOW_BRANCH\MM_MainRect\MM_ButtonList\MM_Button:0" endif if OpenMCM if GetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\MCM\MCM_Trigger\_enabled" == 0 MessageBoxEx "No mod requiring MCM has been detected." else PlaySound UIMenuOK 1 SetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\MAPMO\Hotkeys\MCMButton\_selected" 1 ClickMenuTile "StartMenu\MCM\MCM_Trigger" DisableButton ConB endif elseif CloseMCM PlaySound UIMenuCancel 1 SetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\MAPMO\Hotkeys\MCMButton\_selected" 0 ClickMenuTile "StartMenu\MCM\MCM_Back" CallAfter 0.25 ({} => EnableButton ConB) 1 endif if OpenAchievementsLog PlaySound UIMenuOK 1 SetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\NOGLOW_BRANCH\main_container\_enabled" 0 SetUIStringAlt "StartMenu\MAPMO\AchievementsLog\SwitchButton\_text" (GetUIString "StartMenu\MAPMO\AchievementsLog\Log2\_name") ModUIFloat "StartMenu\MAPMO\Hotkeys\AchievementsButton\_logs" MAPMOMainQUEST.TTWOn SetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\MAPMO\Hotkeys\AchievementsButton\_selected" 1 SetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\MAPMO\AchievementsLog\_open" (1+(GetGlobalVariable (MAPMOMainQUEST.TTWGlobal))) DisableButton ConB elseif CloseAchievementsLog PlaySound UIMenuCancel 1 ModUIFloat "StartMenu\MAPMO\Hotkeys\AchievementsButton\_logs" -1 SetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\MAPMO\Hotkeys\AchievementsButton\_selected" 0 SetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\MAPMO\AchievementsLog\_open" 0 SetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\NOGLOW_BRANCH\main_container\_enabled" 1 CallAfter 0.25 ({} => EnableButton ConB) 1 elseif SwitchAchievementsLog PlaySound UIMenuOK 1 if GetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\MAPMO\AchievementsLog\_open" == GetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\MAPMO\AchievementsLog\_logs" SetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\MAPMO\AchievementsLog\_open" 1 else ModUIFloat "StartMenu\MAPMO\AchievementsLog\_open" 1 endif if GetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\MAPMO\AchievementsLog\_open" == GetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\MAPMO\AchievementsLog\_logs" SetUIStringAlt "StartMenu\MAPMO\AchievementsLog\SwitchButton\_text" (GetUIString "StartMenu\MAPMO\AchievementsLog\Log1\_name") else SetUIStringAlt "StartMenu\MAPMO\AchievementsLog\SwitchButton\_text" (GetUIString ("StartMenu\MAPMO\AchievementsLog\Log"+$((GetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\MAPMO\AchievementsLog\_open")+1)+"\_name")) endif endif if OpenB42Notify PlaySound UIMenuOK 1 SetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\MAPMO\Hotkeys\B42NotifyButton\_selected" 1 if IsController == 0 ClickMenuButton "StartMenu\B42NPause\B42NIcon" 1 endif DisableButton ConB elseif CloseB42Notify PlaySound UIMenuCancel 1 SetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\MAPMO\Hotkeys\B42NotifyButton\_selected" 0 ClickMenuButton "StartMenu\B42NP\NOGLOW_BRANCH\TM_Background\TM_depth_rect\TM_close_button" 1 SetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\NOGLOW_BRANCH\main_container\_enabled" 1 CallAfter 0.1 ({} => EnableButton ConB) 1 endif if OpenQuestLog if GetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\QuestLog\visible" > -1 UnloadUIComponent "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\QuestLog" endif MAPMOMainQUEST.ActiveQuestList = GetQuests QuestLogSize = ar_size MAPMOMainQUEST.QuestLogList while (QuestLogSize -= 1) > -1 QuestREF = MAPMOMainQUEST.QuestLogList[QuestLogSize] if eval (ar_find QuestREF MAPMOMainQUEST.ActiveQuestList) < 0 ar_erase MAPMOMainQUEST.QuestLogList QuestLogSize endif loop MAPMOMainQUEST.MAPMOQuestLogMenu = 1 Call MAPMOQuestLog01SCRIPT elseif CloseQuestLog ClickMenuButton "MessageMenu\NOGLOW_BRANCH\MM_MainRect\MM_ButtonList\MM_Button:0" elseif ToggleQuestLog if GetUIFloat "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\QuestLog\visible" == 1 if MAPMOMainQUEST.QuestLogToggle MAPMOMainQUEST.QuestLogToggle = 0 else MAPMOMainQUEST.QuestLogToggle = 1 endif Call MAPMOQuestLogSCRIPT 1 endif endif if ClearQuest ClearActiveQuest Call MAPMOQuestLogSCRIPT 1 endif if SwitchQuest QuestIndex = ar_find GetActiveQuest MAPMOMainQUEST.QuestLogList QuestLogSize = ar_size MAPMOMainQUEST.QuestLogList if eval QuestIndex < 0 || QuestIndex == (QuestLogSize-1) QuestIndex = -1 endif while (QuestIndex += 1) < QuestLogSize QuestREF = MAPMOMainQUEST.QuestLogList[QuestIndex] if eval !(GetQuestCompleted QuestREF) && GetQuestRunning QuestREF SetCurrentQuest QuestREF Call MAPMOQuestLogSCRIPT 1 Break endif loop endif if PipTrackQuest >= 3 QuestREF = GetSelectedItemRef if eval !(IsFormValid QuestREF) Return elseif GetType QuestREF != 71 Return elseif eval GetQuestCompleted QuestREF || !(GetQuestRunning QuestREF) Return endif MAPMOMainQUEST.QuestLogToggle = 1 UnloadUIComponent "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\QuestLog" if eval (ar_find QuestREF MAPMOMainQUEST.QuestLogList) > -1 PlaySound UIMenuCancel 1 ar_erase MAPMOMainQUEST.QuestLogList (ar_find QuestREF MAPMOMainQUEST.QuestLogList) else PlaySound UIMenuOK 1 ar_append MAPMOMainQUEST.QuestLogList QuestREF endif endif if eval ConNavUp || ConNavDown || ConNavLeft || ConNavRight int FocusH = GetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\MAPMO\AchievementsLog\_focus_h" int FocusV = GetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\MAPMO\AchievementsLog\_focus_v" int iCount if ConNavUp while (iCount += 1) < 8 FocusVNew = FocusV-iCount if GetUIFloatAlt ("StartMenu\MAPMO\AchievementsLog\Log"+$ConNavUp+"\H"+$FocusH+"V"+$FocusVNew+"\visible") > -1 PlaySound UIMenuFocus 1 SetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\MAPMO\AchievementsLog\_focus_v" FocusVNew Break endif loop endif if ConNavDown while (iCount += 1) < 8 FocusVNew = FocusV+iCount if GetUIFloatAlt ("StartMenu\MAPMO\AchievementsLog\Log"+$ConNavDown+"\H"+$FocusH+"V"+$FocusVNew+"\visible") > -1 PlaySound UIMenuFocus 1 SetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\MAPMO\AchievementsLog\_focus_v" FocusVNew Break endif loop endif if ConNavLeft while (iCount += 1) < 16 FocusHNew = FocusH-iCount if GetUIFloatAlt ("StartMenu\MAPMO\AchievementsLog\Log"+$ConNavLeft+"\H"+$FocusHNew+"V"+$FocusV+"\visible") > -1 PlaySound UIMenuFocus 1 SetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\MAPMO\AchievementsLog\_focus_h" FocusHNew Break endif loop endif if ConNavRight while (iCount += 1) < 16 FocusHNew = FocusH+iCount if GetUIFloatAlt ("StartMenu\MAPMO\AchievementsLog\Log"+$ConNavRight+"\H"+$FocusHNew+"V"+$FocusV+"\visible") > -1 PlaySound UIMenuFocus 1 SetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\MAPMO\AchievementsLog\_focus_h" FocusHNew Break endif loop endif endif End

ESP.ORIGINAL:
scn MAPMOQuestLog02SCRIPT
int iButton int QuestREFIndex
ref QuestREF
Begin Function {iButton} if iButton >= ar_size MAPMOMainQUEST.ActiveQuestList ek 1 MAPMOMainQUEST.MAPMOQuestLogMenu = 0 MAPMOMainQUEST.ActiveQuestList = ar_null MAPMOMainQUEST.QuestLogToggle = 1 Return endif QuestREF = MAPMOMainQUEST.ActiveQuestList[iButton] QuestREFIndex = ar_find QuestREF MAPMOMainQUEST.QuestLogList if QuestREFIndex > -1 ar_erase MAPMOMainQUEST.QuestLogList QuestREFIndex else ar_append MAPMOMainQUEST.QuestLogList QuestREF endif Call MAPMOQuestLog01SCRIPT End

scn MAPMOQuestLog01SCRIPT
int iCount int QuestREFIndex int QuestListSize
ref QuestREF
string_var QuestLogMenu
Begin Function {} dk 1 QuestLogMenu = "^QUEST LOG^" iCount = -1 QuestListSize = ar_size MAPMOMainQUEST.ActiveQuestList while QuestListSize > (iCount += 1) QuestREF = MAPMOMainQUEST.ActiveQuestList[iCount] QuestREFIndex = ar_find QuestREF MAPMOMainQUEST.QuestLogList if QuestREFIndex > -1 QuestLogMenu += "|"+$(QuestREFIndex+1)+" : "+$QuestREF else QuestLogMenu += "|_ : "+$QuestREF endif loop QuestLogMenu += "|CLOSE" MessageBoxExAlt MAPMOQuestLog02SCRIPT $QuestLogMenu End
ESP.TRADUIT:
scn MAPMOQuestLog01SCRIPT
int iCount int QuestREFIndex int QuestListSize
ref QuestREF
string_var QuestLogMenu
Begin Function {} dk 1 QuestLogMenu = "^任务日志^" iCount = -1 QuestListSize = ar_size MAPMOMainQUEST.ActiveQuestList while QuestListSize > (iCount += 1) QuestREF = MAPMOMainQUEST.ActiveQuestList[iCount] QuestREFIndex = ar_find QuestREF MAPMOMainQUEST.QuestLogList if QuestREFIndex > -1 QuestLogMenu += "|"+$(QuestREFIndex+1)+" : "+$QuestREF else QuestLogMenu += "|_ : "+$QuestREF endif loop QuestLogMenu += "|关闭" MessageBoxExAlt MAPMOQuestLog02SCRIPT $QuestLogMenu End

ESP.ORIGINAL: Press KEY while in the Pause menu to open the Achievements log.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在暂停菜单时按KEY键打开成就日志

ESP.ORIGINAL: Press KEY while in GameMode to switch active quest.%rPress SHIFT+KEY while in GameMode clear active quest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在游戏模式下按KEY键切换当前任务。%r在游戏模式下按SHIFT+KEY键清除当前任务

ESP.ORIGINAL: Press KEY while in GameMode to Show\Hide the Quest Log.%rPress SHIFT+KEY while in GameMode to track quests.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在游戏模式下按KEY键显示\隐藏任务日志。%r在游戏模式下按SHIFT+KEY键追踪任务

ESP.ORIGINAL: Press KEY while in the Pause menu to open MCM.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在暂停菜单时按KEY键打开MCM

ESP.ORIGINAL: Press KEY while in the Main or Pause menus to open MAPMO's menu.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在主菜单或暂停菜单时按KEY键打开MAPMO的菜单

ESP.ORIGINAL: The settings below will be applied to the pop-up background.
TTW Only. Changes the background texture depending on which wasteland you're in.
Changes will be applied after closing the Pause menu.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在关闭暂停菜单后，将应用更改

else sTime += " AM" endif endif SetUIStringAlt "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\GameTime\string" $sTime endif End

iXPBase)+((GetNumericGameSetting iXPBumpBase)*(iCount-2)) endif NextXP += (GetNumericGameSetting iXPBase)+((GetNumericGameSetting iXPBumpBase)*(iCount-1)) loop CurrentXP = NextXP-GetXPForNextLevel "+$PlayerLevel) if CurrentXP >= NextXP SetUIStringAlt "StartMenu\MAPMO\XPMeter\XPCurrent\string" ($NextXP) if PlayerLevel != GetNumericGameSetting iMaxCharacterLevel SetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\MAPMO\XPMeter\LevelUp\visible" 1 endif else SetUIStringAlt "StartMenu\MAPMO\XPMeter\XPCurrent\string" ($CurrentXP) endif SetUIStringAlt "StartMenu\MAPMO\XPMeter\XPTotal\string" ($NextXP) Counter.ini") endif

(iCount += 1) if IsFormValid (MAPMOMainQUEST.QuestLogList[iCount]) QuestREF = MAPMOMainQUEST.QuestLogList[iCount] if eval GetQuestCompleted QuestREF || !(GetQuestRunning QuestREF) Continue endif else Continue endif if GetUIFloatAlt ("StartMenu\MAPMO\QuestLog\QuestTitle"+$iCount+"\visible") < 0 AddTileFromTemplate ("StartMenu\MAPMO\QuestLog|QuestTitleTemplate|QuestTitle"+$iCount) SetUIFloatAlt ("StartMenu\MAPMO\QuestLog\QuestTitle"+$iCount+"\_active") (QuestREF == GetActiveQuest) SetUIStringAlt ("StartMenu\MAPMO\QuestLog\QuestTitle"+$iCount+"\Text\string") (sv_ToUpper $QuestREF) endif GetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\MAPMO\UserTime\visible" > 0 iTime = GetUserTime["Hour"] if GetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\MAPMO\UserTime\visible" == 2 if iTime > 12 iTime -= 12 elseif iTime == 0 iTime = 12 endif scn MAPMOHUDCapsSCRIPT
int AddCaps int TotalCaps
float GradualTime
Begin Function {} if GetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\HUDCaps\visible" != 1 Return endif TotalCaps = Player.GetItemCount Caps001 AddCaps = TotalCaps - MAPMOMainQUEST.TotalCaps GradualTime = 0.125 if GetGameLoaded SetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\HUDCaps\_showhide" 0 if eval !(MAPMOMainQUEST.HUDCapsAlwaysVisible) SetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\HUDCaps\Icon\alpha" 0 SetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\HUDCaps\TotalCaps\alpha" 0 endif SetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\HUDCaps\Icon\rotateangle" 0 SetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\HUDCaps\AddCaps\alpha" 0 MAPMOMainQUEST.TotalCaps = TotalCaps SetUIStringAlt "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\HUDCaps\TotalCaps\string" (sv_construct "%.0f" MAPMOMainQUEST.TotalCaps) elseif eval (TotalCaps > MAPMOMainQUEST.TotalCaps || TotalCaps < MAPMOMainQUEST.TotalCaps) && GetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\HUDCaps\_showhide" > -1 if GetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\HUDCaps\_showhide" == 0 ModUIFloat "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\HUDCaps\_showhide" 1 if eval !(MAPMOMainQUEST.HUDCapsAlwaysVisible) SetUIFloatGradual "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\HUDCaps\Icon\alpha" 0 (GetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\alpha") GradualTime SetUIFloatGradual "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\HUDCaps\Icon\_scale" 0.96 0.63 GradualTime SetUIFloatGradual "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\HUDCaps\TotalCaps\alpha" 0 (GetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\alpha") (GradualTime*2) SetUIFloatGradual "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\HUDCaps\TotalCaps\_xpos" 0.1 1 GradualTime CallAfter GradualTime ({} => SetUIFloatGradual "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\HUDCaps\TotalCaps\_xpos" (GetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\HUDCaps\TotalCaps\_xpos") 1.15 GradualTime) CallAfter (GradualTime*2) ({} => SetUIFloatGradual "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\HUDCaps\TotalCaps\_xpos" (GetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\HUDCaps\TotalCaps\_xpos") 1 GradualTime) endif elseif GetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\HUDCaps\_showhide" == 1 ModUIFloat "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\HUDCaps\_showhide" 1 CallAfter 0.275 (Begin Function {} ModUIFloat "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\HUDCaps\_showhide" 1 SetUIFloatGradual "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\HUDCaps\AddCaps\alpha" 0 ((GetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\alpha")/1.25) (GradualTime*2) SetUIFloatGradual "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\HUDCaps\AddCaps\_ypos" 0.1 1 GradualTime End) CallAfter 0.4 ({} => SetUIFloatGradual "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\HUDCaps\AddCaps\_ypos" (GetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\HUDCaps\AddCaps\_ypos") 0.85 GradualTime) CallAfter 0.525 ({} => SetUIFloatGradual "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\HUDCaps\AddCaps\_ypos" (GetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\HUDCaps\AddCaps\_ypos") 1 GradualTime) elseif GetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\HUDCaps\_showhide" == 3 ModUIFloat "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\HUDCaps\_showhide" 1 CallAfter 1 (Begin Function {} ModUIFloat "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\HUDCaps\_showhide" 1 if TotalCaps < MAPMOMainQUEST.TotalCaps if MAPMOMainQUEST.HUDCapsPlaySound PlaySound ITMBottlecapsDown endif elseif MAPMOMainQUEST.HUDCapsPlaySound PlaySound ITMBottlecapsUp endif End) elseif GetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\HUDCaps\_showhide" == 5 if AddCaps > 1000000 MAPMOMainQUEST.TotalCaps += 100000 elseif AddCaps > 100000 MAPMOMainQUEST.TotalCaps += 10000 elseif AddCaps > 10000 MAPMOMainQUEST.TotalCaps += 1000 elseif AddCaps > 1000 MAPMOMainQUEST.TotalCaps += 100 elseif AddCaps > 100 MAPMOMainQUEST.TotalCaps += 10 elseif AddCaps < -1000000 MAPMOMainQUEST.TotalCaps -= 100000 elseif AddCaps < -100000 MAPMOMainQUEST.TotalCaps -= 10000 elseif AddCaps < -10000 MAPMOMainQUEST.TotalCaps -= 1000 elseif AddCaps < -1000 MAPMOMainQUEST.TotalCaps -= 100 elseif AddCaps < -100 MAPMOMainQUEST.TotalCaps -= 10 elseif TotalCaps < MAPMOMainQUEST.TotalCaps MAPMOMainQUEST.TotalCaps -= 1 else MAPMOMainQUEST.TotalCaps += 1 endif AddCaps = TotalCaps - MAPMOMainQUEST.TotalCaps endif SetUIStringAlt "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\HUDCaps\TotalCaps\string" (sv_construct "%.0f" MAPMOMainQUEST.TotalCaps) if TotalCaps > MAPMOMainQUEST.TotalCaps SetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\HUDCaps\AddCaps\systemcolor" 1 SetUIStringAlt "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\HUDCaps\AddCaps\string" ("+"+(sv_construct "%.0f" AddCaps)) elseif TotalCaps < MAPMOMainQUEST.TotalCaps SetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\HUDCaps\AddCaps\systemcolor" 2 SetUIStringAlt "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\HUDCaps\AddCaps\string" (sv_construct "%.0f" AddCaps) else SetUIStringAlt "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\HUDCaps\AddCaps\string" "0" endif elseif GetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\HUDCaps\_showhide" > 0 SetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\HUDCaps\_showhide" -1 CallAfter (GradualTime*2) ({} => SetUIFloatGradual "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\HUDCaps\AddCaps\_ypos" (GetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\HUDCaps\AddCaps\_ypos") 1.15 GradualTime) CallAfter 0.375 (Begin Function {} SetUIFloatGradual "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\HUDCaps\AddCaps\alpha" ((GetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\alpha")\1.25) 0 (GradualTime*2) SetUIFloatGradual "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\HUDCaps\AddCaps\_ypos" (GetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\HUDCaps\AddCaps\_ypos") 0.1 (GradualTime*2) End) if MAPMOMainQUEST.HUDCapsAlwaysVisible CallAfter 0.5 ({} => SetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\HUDCaps\_showhide" 0) else CallAfter 1.025 ({} => SetUIFloatGradual "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\HUDCaps\TotalCaps\_xpos" (GetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\HUDCaps\TotalCaps\_xpos") 1.15 GradualTime) CallAfter 1.15 (Begin Function {} SetUIFloatGradual "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\HUDCaps\TotalCaps\alpha" (GetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\alpha") 0 (GradualTime*2) SetUIFloatGradual "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\HUDCaps\TotalCaps\_xpos" (GetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\HUDCaps\TotalCaps\_xpos") 0.1 (GradualTime*2) End) CallAfter 1.40 ({} => SetUIFloatGradual "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\HUDCaps\Icon\alpha" (GetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\alpha") 0 (GradualTime*2)) CallAfter 1.65 ({} => SetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\HUDCaps\_showhide" 0) endif endif if MAPMOMainQUEST.HUDCapsRotateIcon if GetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\HUDCaps\Icon\rotateangle" == 0 SetUIFloatGradual "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\HUDCaps\Icon\rotateangle" 0 6.25 MAPMOMainQUEST.HUDCapsRotateSpeed elseif GetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\HUDCaps\Icon\rotateangle" >= 6.25 SetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\HUDCaps\Icon\rotateangle" 0 endif elseif GetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\HUDCaps\Icon\rotateangle" != 0 SetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\HUDCaps\Icon\rotateangle" 0 endif if eval MAPMOMainQUEST.HUDCapsAlwaysVisible || GetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\_MAPMOConfig" == 1 if GetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\HUDCaps\_alwaysvisible" != 1 SetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\HUDCaps\_alwaysvisible" 1 SetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\HUDCaps\Icon\alpha" (GetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\alpha") SetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\HUDCaps\Icon\_scale" 0.63 SetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\HUDCaps\TotalCaps\alpha" (GetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\alpha") SetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\HUDCaps\TotalCaps\_xpos" 1 endif elseif GetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\HUDCaps\_alwaysvisible" == 1 SetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\HUDCaps\_alwaysvisible" 0 ModUIFloat "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\HUDCaps\_showhide" 1 endif End

scn MAPMOAchievementsMiscStatsSCRIPT
int iStatCode int iModVal int iNewVal
Begin Function {iStatCode iModVal iNewVal} if iStatCode == 1 ;Locations Discovered if eval MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.WalkerOfTheMojave == 0 && iNewVal >= 50 MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.WalkerOfTheMojave = 1 endif if eval MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.OneManScoutingParty == 0 && iNewVal >= 100 MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.OneManScoutingParty = 1 endif if eval MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.MasterOfTheMojave == 0 && iNewVal >= 125 MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.MasterOfTheMojave = 1 endif elseif iStatCode == 2 ;People Killed if eval MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.DoesntPlayWellwithOthers == 0 && iNewVal >= 300 MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.DoesntPlayWellwithOthers = 1 endif elseif iStatCode == 3 ;Creatures Killed if eval MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.SlayerofBeasts == 0 && iNewVal >= 300 MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.SlayerofBeasts = 1 endif elseif iStatCode == 4 ;Locks Picked if eval MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.NoTumblerFumbler == 0 && iNewVal >= 25 MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.NoTumblerFumbler = 1 endif if eval MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.KeysareforCowards == 0 && iNewVal >= 50 MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.KeysareforCowards = 1 endif elseif iStatCode == 5 ;Computers Hacked if eval MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.HackTheMojave == 0 && iNewVal >= 25 MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.HackTheMojave = 1 endif if eval MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.DataMiner == 0 && iNewVal >= 50 MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.DataMiner = 1 endif elseif iStatCode == 12 ;Speech Successes if eval MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.OutstandingOrator == 0 && iNewVal >= 50 MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.OutstandingOrator = 1 endif if eval MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.SilverTonguedDevil == 0 && iNewVal >= 50 MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.SilverTonguedDevil = 1 endif elseif iStatCode == 13 ;Pockets Picked if eval MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.ArtfulPocketer == 0 && iNewVal >= 50 MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.ArtfulPocketer = 1 endif elseif iStatCode == 14 ;Pants Exploded if eval MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.PsychoticPrankster == 0 && iNewVal >= 1 MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.PsychoticPrankster = 1 endif elseif iStatCode == 32 ;Items Crafted if eval MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.Crafty == 0 && iNewVal >= 20 MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.Crafty = 1 endif elseif iStatCode == 33 ;Weapon Modifications if eval MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.ModMachine == 0 && iNewVal >= 20 MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.ModMachine = 1 endif elseif iStatCode == 34 ;Items Repaired if eval MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.JuryRigger == 0 && iNewVal >= 30 MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.JuryRigger = 1 endif elseif iStatCode == 37 ;Caravan Games Won if eval MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.KnowWhenToFoldThem == 0 && iNewVal >= 3 MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.KnowWhenToFoldThem = 1 endif if eval MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.CaravanMaster == 0 && iNewVal >= 30 MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.CaravanMaster = 1 endif elseif iStatCode == 39 ;Barter Amount Traded if eval MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.YouRunBarterTown == 0 && iNewVal >= 10000 MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.YouRunBarterTown = 1 endif elseif iStatCode == 40 ;Roulette Games Played if eval MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.LittleWheel == 0 && iNewVal >= 10 MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.LittleWheel = 1 endif elseif iStatCode == 41 ;Blackjack Games Played if eval MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.DoubleDown == 0 && iNewVal >= 10 MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.DoubleDown = 1 endif elseif iStatCode == 42 ;Slots Games Played if eval MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.OneArmedBandit == 0 && iNewVal >= 10 MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.OneArmedBandit = 1 endif endif End

scn MAPMOAchievementsChallengesSCRIPT
ref ChallengeREF
string_var ChallengeREFID
Begin Function {ChallengeREF} ChallengeREFID = GetEditorID ChallengeREF ;NEW VEGAS if ChallengeREF == NVChallengeBlasterMaster MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.BlastMastery = 1 elseif ChallengeREF == NVChallengeLoveBomb MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.LoveTheBomb = 1 elseif ChallengeREF == NVChallengeLeadDeal MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.LeadDealer = 1 elseif ChallengeREF == NVChallengeStimAmount MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.StimplyAmazing = 1 elseif ChallengeREF == NVChallengeSamurai MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.NewVegasSamurai = 1 elseif ChallengeREF == NVChallengeSurvival MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.DesertSurvivalist = 1 elseif ChallengeREF == NVChallengeOldTyme MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.OldTymeBrawler = 1
;DEAD MONEY elseif ChallengeREF == NVDLC01AchievementAssembleCrew MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.AssembleYourCrew = 1 elseif ChallengeREF == NVDLC01AchievementCashOut MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.CashOut = 1 elseif ChallengeREF == NVDLC01AchievementHavingABall MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.HavingaBall = 1 elseif ChallengeREF == NVDLC01AchievementSafetyDepositBox MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.SafetyDepositBox = 1 elseif ChallengeREF == NVDLC01AchievementSouvenirAficionado MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.SierraMadreSouvenirAfficionado = 1
;HONEST HEARTS elseif ChallengeREF == NVDLC02AchievementInAForeignLand MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.InaForeignLand = 1 elseif ChallengeREF == NVDLC02AchievementHandForgetItsSkill MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.MaymyHandForgetItsSkill = 1 elseif ChallengeREF == NVDLC02AchievementODaughterOfBabylon MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.ODaughterofBabylon = 1 elseif ChallengeREF == NVDLC02AchievementRestoreOurFortunes MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.RestoreOurFortunes = 1 elseif ChallengeREF == NVDLC02AchievementRememberedZion MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.WhenWeRememberedZion = 1
;OLD WORLD BLUES elseif ChallengeREF == NVDLC03AchievementChangeofHeart MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.CardiacArrest = 1 elseif ChallengeREF == NVDLC03AchievementMakeUpYourMind MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.MakeUpYourMind = 1 elseif ChallengeREF == NVDLC03AchievementMakingFriends MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.MakingFriends = 1 elseif ChallengeREF == NVDLC03AchievementOutSmarted MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.Outsmarted = 1 elseif ChallengeREF == NVDLC03AchievementSpinalTapped MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.SpinalTapped = 1
;LONESOME ROAD elseif ChallengeREF == NVDLC04AchievementEDECATED MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.EDEcated = 1 elseif ChallengeREF == NVDLC04AchievementDoomedtoRepeat MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.CondemnedToRepeatIt = 1 elseif ChallengeREF == NVDLC04AchievementHometownHero MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.HometownHero = 1 elseif ChallengeREF == NVDLC04AchievementRocketsRedGlare MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.RocketsRedGlare = 1 elseif ChallengeREF == NVDLC04AchievementWarheadHunter MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.WarheadHunter = 1
;GUN RUNNERS' ARSENAL elseif ChallengeREF == NVDLC05ChallengeCuriosAndRelics MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.CuriosandRelics = 1 elseif ChallengeREF == NVDLC05ChallengeMasterOfTheArsenal MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.MasteroftheArsenal = 1
;FALLOUT 3 elseif eval ChallengeREFID == "TTWChallengeCitizen" MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.Vault101CitizenshipAward = 1 elseif eval ChallengeREFID == "TTWChallengeGOAT" MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.TheGOATWhisperer = 1 elseif eval ChallengeREFID == "TTWChallengeBigger" MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.TheBiggerTheyAre = 1
;OPERATION ANCHORAGE
;THE PITT elseif eval ChallengeREFID == "TTWDLC01ChallengeMillWorker" MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.MillWorker = 1
;BROKEN STEEL
;POINT LOOKOUT elseif eval ChallengeREFID == "TTWDLC04BogWalker" MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.BogWalker = 1
;MOTHERSHIP ZETA elseif eval ChallengeREFID == "TTWDLC05ChallengeArchivist" MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.AlienArchivist = 1 endif End

scn MAPMOMenuClickSCRIPT
int iMenuID int iTileID
string_var sTileName
Begin Function {iMenuID iTileID sTileName} if MenuMode 3 Return endif sTileName = GetActiveUIComponentFullName ;NOGLOW_BRANCH if eval sv_find "StartMenu/NOGLOW_BRANCH/options_container/lb_toggle_template_item" sTileName > -1 if eval GetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\NOGLOW_BRANCH\settings_container\lb_item_hotrect:2\target" == 0 && GetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\NOGLOW_BRANCH\settings_container\lb_item_hotrect:2\ListItemText\brightness" > 127 if eval GetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\NOGLOW_BRANCH\options_container\lb_toggle_template_item:4\mouseover" || GetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\NOGLOW_BRANCH\options_container\lb_toggle_template_item:4\lb_toggle_value\mouseover" == 1 || GetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\NOGLOW_BRANCH\options_container\lb_toggle_template_item:5\mouseover" || GetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\NOGLOW_BRANCH\options_container\lb_toggle_template_item:5\lb_toggle_value\mouseover" == 1 MAPMOMainQUEST.FastExit = 1 MAPMOMainQUEST.MAPMOCurrentMenu = 37 Call MAPMOConfig01SCRIPT ClickMenuButton "StartMenu\NOGLOW_BRANCH\settings_container" endif endif Return endif ;MAPMO if eval sTileName == "StartMenu/MAPMO/Hotkeys/MAPMOButton" MAPMOMainQUEST.MAPMOCurrentMenu = 1 Call MAPMOConfig01SCRIPT Return endif if eval sTileName == "StartMenu/MAPMO/Hotkeys/MCMButton" if GetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\MCM\MCM_Trigger\_enabled" == 0 MessageBoxEx "No mod requiring MCM has been detected." elseif GetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\MCM\MCM_Options\visible" == 1 SetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\MAPMO\Hotkeys\MCMButton\_selected" 0 ClickMenuTile "StartMenu\MCM\MCM_Back" else SetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\MAPMO\Hotkeys\MCMButton\_selected" 1 ClickMenuTile "StartMenu\MCM\MCM_Trigger" endif Return endif if eval sTileName == "StartMenu/MCM/MCM_Back" SetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\MAPMO\Hotkeys\MCMButton\_selected" 0 Return endif if eval sTileName == "StartMenu/MAPMO/Hotkeys/AchievementsButton" if GetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\MAPMO\AchievementsLog\_open" == 0 SetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\NOGLOW_BRANCH\main_container\_enabled" 0 SetUIStringAlt "StartMenu\MAPMO\AchievementsLog\SwitchButton\_text" (GetUIString "StartMenu\MAPMO\AchievementsLog\Log2\_name") SetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\MAPMO\Hotkeys\AchievementsButton\_selected" 1 SetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\MAPMO\AchievementsLog\_open" (1+(GetGlobalVariable (MAPMOMainQUEST.TTWGlobal))) else SetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\MAPMO\Hotkeys\AchievementsButton\_selected" 0 SetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\MAPMO\AchievementsLog\_open" 0 SetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\NOGLOW_BRANCH\main_container\_enabled" 1 endif Return endif if eval sTileName == "StartMenu/MAPMO/AchievementsLog/ExitButton" SetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\MAPMO\Hotkeys\AchievementsButton\_selected" 0 SetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\NOGLOW_BRANCH\main_container\_enabled" 1 SetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\MAPMO\AchievementsLog\_open" 0 Return endif if eval sTileName == "StartMenu/MAPMO/AchievementsLog/SwitchButton" if GetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\MAPMO\AchievementsLog\_open" == GetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\MAPMO\AchievementsLog\_logs" SetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\MAPMO\AchievementsLog\_open" 1 else ModUIFloat "StartMenu\MAPMO\AchievementsLog\_open" 1 endif if GetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\MAPMO\AchievementsLog\_open" == GetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\MAPMO\AchievementsLog\_logs" SetUIStringAlt "StartMenu\MAPMO\AchievementsLog\SwitchButton\_text" (GetUIString "StartMenu\MAPMO\AchievementsLog\Log1\_name") else SetUIStringAlt "StartMenu\MAPMO\AchievementsLog\SwitchButton\_text" (GetUIString ("StartMenu\MAPMO\AchievementsLog\Log"+$((GetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\MAPMO\AchievementsLog\_open")+1)+"\_name")) endif Return endif if eval sTileName == "StartMenu/MAPMO/Hotkeys/B42NotifyButton" if GetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\B42NP\visible" < 0 SetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\MAPMO\Hotkeys\B42NotifyButton\_selected" 1 ClickMenuButton "StartMenu\B42NPause\B42NIcon" 1 else SetUIFloatAlt "StartMenu\MAPMO\Hotkeys\B42NotifyButton\_selected" 0 ClickMenuButton "StartMenu\B42NP\NOGLOW_BRANCH\TM_Background\TM_depth_rect\TM_close_button" 1 endif Return endif End

scn MAPMOAchievementsCraftingSCRIPT
int iQuantity
ref ItemREF
string_var ItemREFID
Begin Function {ItemREF iQuantity} ItemREFID = GetEditorID ItemREF if ItemREF == WeapMineBottlecap countBottlecap += iQuantity elseif eval ItemREFID == "WeapDartGun" || ItemREFID == "DartGunItem" countDartgun += iQuantity elseif eval ItemREFID == "WeapDeathclawGauntlet" || ItemREFID == "DeathclawGauntletItem" countDeathclaw += iQuantity elseif eval ItemREFID == "NVDLC05WeapGrenadeNuka" || ItemREFID == "WeapNukaCocktail" countNuka += iQuantity elseif eval ItemREFID == "WeapRailwayRifle" || ItemREFID == "RailwayRifleItem" countRailway += iQuantity elseif eval ItemREFID == "WeapRockItLauncher" || ItemREFID == "RockItLauncherItem" countRockit += iQuantity elseif eval ItemREFID == "WeapShishkebab" || ItemREFID == "ShishkebabItem" countShishkebab += iQuantity endif if eval countBottlecap && countDartgun && countDeathclaw && countNuka && countRailway && countRockit && countShishkebab countWeapAchievement = 1 if MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.Weaponsmith == 0 CallWhen MAPMOAchievementsPopUpSCRIPT ({} => GetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\MAPMO\AchievementPopUp\_busy" == 0) 5 "Weaponsmith" "WEAPONSMITH" "Make one of every custom weapon." MAPMOAchievementsTrackerQUEST.Weaponsmith = 2 endif endif End
